column2: What do you think was the reason?
Hard to s-s-say whether it was aggression against you or something more serious…
Hm. Got it. Okay, Gordon, over and out.
Y-yes. Maybe, you just… well… they didn't like you, as a creature. Who c-can understand those aliens? *Gordon adjusts his glasses.*
Hm. Got it. Okay, Gordon, over and out.
That is the worst case scenario. With an assassination attempt they let you know they w-w-want war.
Hm. Got it. Okay, Gordon, over and out.
I don't kn-know… You'd have to ask someone who knows Zorsan, Captain. Maybe you could talk to other aliens.
Hm. Got it. Okay, Gordon, over and out.
